item.title: 俄罗斯禁止访问美国儿童游戏平台 Roblox
item.description: 俄罗斯指责该游戏平台传播极端主义材料和 "女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者宣传"。【原文：Russia accused the gaming platform of distributing extremist materials and "LGBT propaganda."】

item.title: 公民银行认为消费者的财务和支出具有弹性
item.description: 美国公民金融集团（Citizens Financial Group）总裁布兰登-考富林（Brendan Coughlin）周三表示，尽管有迹象表明信用评分较低的借款人面临压力，但美国消费者的财务状况大体保持健康。【原文：U.S. consumer finances remain broadly healthy, even though there are some signs of stress for borrowers with lower credit scores, Brendan Coughlin, president of Citizens Financial Group, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司启用新的高超音速武器设施
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周三表示，该公司已在其亨茨维尔（Huntsville）园区开设了一个高超音速系统集成实验室，以推动下一代武器的开发。【原文：Lockheed Martin said on Wednesday it has opened a hypersonics system integration lab at its Huntsville campus as it pushes to develop next-generation weapons.】

item.title: 贝森特认为 "特朗普账户 "将获得更多私人捐款
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他预计会有更多的亿万富翁、基金会和公司向新的 "特朗普账户 "捐款，这些账户将用于资助在 2025 年至 2028 年间出生的 2500 万美国人。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he expects more billionaires, foundations and corporations to contribute funds to the new "Trump accounts" for 25 million Americans born between 2025 and 2028, which he said will help them participate in asset appreciation now associated with wealthier families.】

item.title: 贝森特计划推动美联储银行行长地区居住要求
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，他计划倡导一项要求，即 12 家地区联邦储备银行行长在被任命为其银行领导之前，应在其所在地区居住至少三年。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday said he plans to advocate for a requirement that the 12 regional Federal Reserve Bank presidents should reside in their districts for at least three years before being appointed to lead their banks.】

item.title: 美国 11 月服务业变化不大，但订单放缓
item.description: 周三的一项调查显示，11月份美国服务业活动保持稳定，就业依然低迷，投入品价格上涨。【原文：The U.S. services sector activity held steady in November, with employment still subdued and prices for inputs elevated, a survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贝森特中国正以 "正确的节奏 "完成对美国大豆的采购承诺
item.description: 美国财政部长贝森特表示，鉴于资本投资的增加，他对明年的美国经济非常乐观，但他说，鉴于包括住房在内的某些行业的疲软，需要降息。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Bessent said he was very optimistic about the U.S. economy next year, given increased capital investments, but said interest rate cuts were needed given a weakening in certain sectors including housing.】

item.title: Nebius 利用微软和 Meta 的合同拓展人工智能业务
item.description: 荷兰数据中心运营商 Nebius 的联合创始人表示，Nebius 将利用最近与微软和 Meta 签订的数十亿美元合同，与传统企业和新兴人工智能公司（可能成为未来的科技巨头）建立业务关系。【原文：Netherlands-based data centre operator Nebius will leverage recent multi-billion dollar contracts with Microsoft and Meta to build its business with traditional firms and emerging AI companies that could be future tech titans, its co-founder said.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的安全公司 Verkada 在最新一轮投资中估值达 58 亿美元
item.description: 这家基于人工智能的安全产品制造商周三表示，在 CapitalG 领投的最新一轮投资中，Verkada 的估值为 58 亿美元，比 2 月份的上一轮投资高出 10 亿多美元。【原文：Verkada was valued at $5.8 billion in its latest investment round led by CapitalG, more than a billion dollars higher than its previous round in February, the AI-based security products maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 世界银行警告发展中国家 "尚未脱离危险"，债务成本创历史新高
item.description: 世界银行周三表示，发展中国家的偿债成本与新融资之间的缺口在2022年至2024年期间将达到7410亿美元，创下50多年来的新高。【原文：The gap between developing nations' debt servicing costs and new financing hit a more than 50-year high of $741 billion between 2022 and 2024, the World Bank said on Wednesday, urging countries to use the more relaxed global financing conditions to bring their houses in order.】

item.title: 达美航空因美国政府停摆遭受 2 亿美元利润损失
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周三表示，预计上个月结束的美国政府停摆将对其第四季度税前利润造成 2 亿美元的影响。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Wednesday it expects a $200 million impact to its fourth quarter pre-tax profit from the government shutdown in the United States which ended last month.】

item.title: 聚焦：对冲基金利用近乎创纪录的杠杆率加倍努力提高回报率
item.description: 对冲基金正在使用接近创纪录水平的杠杆交易股票，并押注于债务支持策略，以努力增加回报，充分利用人工智能蓬勃发展所推动的市场。【原文：Hedge funds are using near-record levels of leverage to trade equities and betting on debt-backed strategies in efforts to juice returns, making the most of markets buoyed by a boom in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: FDA 对 WHOOP 的审查预示着利基可穿戴设备制造商将面临挑战
item.description: 由于技术进步模糊了可穿戴设备和医疗设备之间的界限，WHOOP 等小众健身追踪公司正受到越来越多的监管审查，这使它们面临更高的合规成本，并阻碍了它们的竞争优势。【原文：Niche fitness-tracking firms such as WHOOP are coming under increased regulatory scrutiny as technological advances blur the lines between wearable and medical devices, exposing them to higher compliance costs and hampering their competitive advantage.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，由于客户抵制新产品，微软降低了人工智能软件的销售配额
item.description: 据 The Information 周三报道，在截至 6 月的财年中，许多销售人员都没有达到目标，因此微软多个部门下调了某些人工智能产品的销售增长目标。【原文：Multiple divisions at Microsoft have lowered sales growth targets for certain artificial intelligence products after many sales staff missed goals in the fiscal year that ended in June, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 米其林、Forvia 和 Stellantis 就 Symbio 重组计划达成一致意见
item.description: 米其林、Forvia 和 Stellantis 三家合资公司周三表示，已就氢燃料电池公司 Symbio 的重组和再融资达成协议。【原文：Michelin , Forvia and Stellantis reached an agreement over the restructuring and refinancing of hydrogen fuel cell firm Symbio, the jointly owned company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟旨在加强抵御中国出口限制等经济威胁的能力
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三概述了通过改进现有贸易措施和利用新的防御措施来加强经济安全，从而使欧盟更能抵御稀土供应紧缩等威胁的计划。【原文：The European Commission outlined plans on Wednesday to make the European Union more resilient to threats such as rare earth supply crunches by improving existing trade measures and using new defences to bolster economic security.】

item.title: 美国九月份进口价格意外持平
item.description: 美国 9 月份的进口价格出乎意料地保持不变，原因是除汽车外，消费品的高成本被较便宜的能源产品所抵消。【原文：U.S. import prices were unexpectedly unchanged in September as high costs for consumer goods, excluding motor vehicles, were offset by cheaper energy products.】

item.title: SoftwareOne 称潜在内幕交易调查引发搜索
item.description: 瑞士科技公司SoftwareOne周三表示，对其位于德国莱比锡和瑞士斯坦兹的办事处进行了搜查，这与对五名非执行现任或前任员工可能的内幕交易违规行为的调查有关。【原文：Swiss technology firm SoftwareOne said on Wednesday searches were conducted at its offices in Leipzig, Germany and Stans, Switzerland linked to a probe into five non-executive current or former employees for potential insider-trading violations.】

item.title: 欧洲债务银行寻求与摩根大通支持的竞争对手多边贷款机构合并
item.description: 欧洲后备力量银行（ERB）旨在为欧洲防务项目建立一个由国家支持的贷款机构，该机构已提议与防务、安全和复原力银行（DSRB）合并，以整合各项工作，增强对各国政府的吸引力。【原文：The European Rearmament Bank (ERB), an initiative to create a state-backed lender for European defence projects, has proposed merging with the Defence, Security and Resilience Bank (DSRB) to consolidate efforts and bolster their appeal to governments.】

item.title: 美国比特币在股票锁定期到期引发近 40% 暴跌后保持稳定
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的两个儿子支持的比特币矿商美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin）的股价在周三的盘前交易中趋于稳定，而在此之前的一天，该公司的股价在股份锁定期到期后暴跌了近40%。【原文：Shares of American Bitcoin , a bitcoin miner backed by two of U.S. President Donald Trump's sons, steadied in premarket trading on Wednesday, a day after slumping nearly 40% following the expiry of a share lock-up.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，前 Pornhub 所有者对卢克石油公司资产感兴趣
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，奥地利商人贝恩德-伯格迈尔（Bernd Bergmair），包括 Pornhub 网站在内的一家成人娱乐集团的前多数股权所有人，已就购买受制裁的俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司（Lukoil）的国际资产一事与美国财政部进行了接洽。【原文：Austrian businessman Bernd Bergmair, former majority owner of an adult entertainment group including website Pornhub, has approached the U.S. Treasury about buying international assets of sanctioned Russian oil major Lukoil , two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 玛格南冰淇淋预计 2028-29 年自由现金流可达 10 亿欧元
item.description: 联合利华下周将在阿姆斯特丹分拆冰淇淋业务上市，该公司周三表示，预计 2028-29 年将实现 8 亿至 10 亿欧元（9.332 亿至 11.7 亿美元）的自由现金流。【原文：Unilever's ice cream business, which is spinning off and listing in Amsterdam next week, expects to achieve free cash flow between 800 million and 1 billion euros ($933.2 million to $1.17 billion) in 2028-29, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: ADP 称美国 11 月私营部门就业人数意外减少
item.description: 美国 ADP 就业报告周三显示，11 月份美国私营企业的就业人数意外下降。【原文：U.S. private payrolls unexpectedly declined in November, the ADP employment report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管有禽流感贸易禁令，巴西 2025 年鸡肉出口仍将增长
item.description: 肉类游说团体巴西肉类协会（ABPA）周三表示，巴西鸡肉出口今年有望增长0.5%，达到532万吨，此前出口商避开了5月份禽流感疫情引发的贸易禁令，包括来自主要买家中国和欧盟的禁令。【原文：Brazilian chicken exports are expected to rise up to 0.5% this year to 5.32 million metric tons, meat lobby ABPA said on Wednesday, after exporters avoided trade bans triggered by a bird flu outbreak in May, including from key buyers China and the European Union.】

item.title: LSEG 将把金融数据整合到 ChatGPT 中，推动人工智能发展
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）周三表示，将把其金融数据和分析整合到 ChatGPT 中，并向其员工提供 OpenAI 的企业工具，进一步推动人工智能在整个金融市场的应用。【原文：LSEG will integrate its financial data and analytics into ChatGPT and make OpenAI's enterprise tool available to its employees, it said on Wednesday, deepening its push to embed artificial intelligence across financial markets.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会停止审查高杠杆 ETF 计划，理由是存在风险敞口
item.description: 美国证券市场监管机构暂停了对几家基金管理公司提出的新的高杠杆交易所交易基金提案的审查，并要求进一步澄清与这些产品相关的风险。【原文：The U.S. securities market regulator has paused the review of proposals for new highly leveraged exchange-traded funds from several fund managers and sought more clarity on the risks tied to the products.】

item.title: 梅西百货上调年度目标，对假日消费持谨慎态度
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周三今年第二次上调了年度目标，并公布了令人惊喜的季度利润，因为这家百货公司长达数月的扭亏为盈努力开始出现回报。【原文：Macy's on Wednesday raised its annual targets for the second time this year and posted surprise quarterly profit, as the department store operator begins to see returns from its months-long turnaround efforts.】

item.title: 美元树因平价产品需求稳定而上调年度利润目标
item.description: 美元树公司（Dollar Tree）周三上调了年度利润预期，此前该公司的季度盈利超过预期，因为这家折扣零售商预计，对其价格实惠的必需品的稳定需求将有助于抵消关税引发的不确定性的影响。【原文：Dollar Tree raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday after beating quarterly earnings estimates, as the discount retailer expects steady demand for its affordable essentials to help counter the impact of tariff-led uncertainty.】

item.title: 早间竞价：风险资产昙花一现，美联储给美元带来更多痛苦
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因降息希望而上涨，数据成为焦点
item.description: 由于投资者加大了对美联储本月降息的押注，并在等待新一波的经济数据，周三美国股指期货走高。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday as investors ramped up bets on a rate cut from the Federal Reserve this month and awaited a fresh wave of economic data.】
